resources.string: Got no contact with internet, activate either EDGE/3G/4G etc or WiFi
No location found, turn on GPS/WiFi?
Need two bus-stops with \'to\' in between
You need to fill inn some stops, now it\'s just dummy-text
Your last search will be here
Were unable to search, check internet connectivity
Don\'t know the name of the bus-stop, use geolocate and \"use address\" in menu or manually write the bus-stop name
I cannot find any more connections on
I cannot find any more connections on that route today

Version 1.1.6
Developed by: Alf Simen SÃ¸rensen

Bugreports, wishes for functionality or other stuff can be sent to simen.sorensen@gmail.com

The app can be used in several different ways:

 1: You either write a searchstring in the searchfield with "*from-stop* til *to-stop*" or with a full sentence like "When does the bus from Sentrum to Buran go if I want to be there before 20.00?"

 2: Touch a busstop in the map to choose *from-stop* and then touch a new one to choose *to-stop*

 3: Get your address by touching "menu" and then "Use your address" and then either writing the end-stop in searchbar or choosing it in the map.

 Unless you write a full sentence when asking the Oracle, it will not understand that you ask in English and it will answer you in Norwegian, I'm sorry I cannot do something to fix this at the moment

 This dialog can be found by pressing menu and choosing "About / Howto use"

The app can be used in several different ways:

 1: You either write a searchstring in the searchfield with "*from-stop* til *to-stop*" or with a full sentence like "When does the bus from Sentrum to Buran go if I want to be there before 20.00?"

 2: Touch a busstop in the map to choose *from-stop* and then touch a new one to choose *to-stop*

 3: Get your address by touching "menu" and then "Use your address" and then either writing the end-stop in searchbar or choosing it in the map.

 Unless you write a full sentence when asking the Oracle, it will not understand that you ask in English and it will answer you in Norwegian, I'm sorry I cannot do something to fix this at the moment.n
 This dialog can be found by pressing menu and choosing "About / Howto use"
